definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: inscribe, note (Nh id..; so Aram. [[רְשַׁם]], r4am; Ar r4m is loan-word Nö:ZMG xxix (1875), 327 Frä:137. 250);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. c. art, as subst. [[הָרָשׁוּם בִּכְתָב אֱמֶת]] Da 10:21 that which is inscribed in the writing of truth.
